lead_paragraph: REDDING--Marie Reiman, 90, of Murphysboro, Illinois, died peacefully on January 27, 2016. She was born on March 28, 1925. Marie worked hard, played well, traveled the world, enjoyed the people she met, survived breast cancer, and truly loved her life. Her only child survives her, Alexandra R. Marshall of Millbrook, NY, New York City and Houston, Texas. She is also survived by her grandson, Dr. Douglas B. Marshall, his wife Dr. Amrita B. Ahuja, and their son, her great- grandson, Ved Rehman Marshall of Houston, TX, currently residing in Northfield, Minnesota; three sisters, one brother-in-law, various nieces, nephews, great-nieces and nephews, and a great-great-niece and nephew. For the last decade of her life, Marie wintered in Houston with her daughter, other family members, and friends as possible. She was treasured by many and will be greatly missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  REDDING, MARIE REIMAN
